metadata.description: In Angel's final television season, his world ended... but his story didn't. Now, IDW Publishing is proud to present the story of Angel: After the Fall, as presided over by Angel co-creator Joss Whedon, along with his hand-picked creative team, picking up where Season Five of the fan-favorite TV show left off! A Top "Pick Hit" - ICv2 Guide to Graphic Novels
metadata.name: Angel: After the Fall
